rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
静脉输注艾塞那肽未能降低心脏手术患者并发症的风险一项大规模临床试验发现，在涉及搭桥的心脏手术期间静脉输注艾塞那肽（一种胰高血糖素样肽-1 (GLP-1) 类似药物）并不能显着降低死亡、中风或器官衰竭的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Intravenous-infusion-of-exenatide-fails-to-reduce-risks-of-complications-in-heart-surgery-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Intravenous-infusion-of-exenatide-fails-to-reduce-risks-of-complications-in-heart-surgery-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62094e3f-00b3-4716-bbf4-82390939e0df Mon, 18 Nov 2024 08:59:29 -0500 Intravenous infusion of exenatide fails to reduce risks of complications in heart surgery patients
新的 MELD 模型改善了女性肝移植的机会自从采用了评估肝病严重程度的新模型以来，女性更有可能被添加到肝移植的候补名单中，更有可能接受移植，并且不太可能退出候补名单；根据计划于今天在美国肝病研究协会举办的肝脏会议上发表的一项研究，缩小了男性和女性候选人之间的差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-MELD-model-improves-liver-transplant-access-for-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-MELD-model-improves-liver-transplant-access-for-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ba89a71-90dd-4243-b667-6b5b22f08fab Mon, 18 Nov 2024 08:44:27 -0500 New MELD model improves liver transplant access for women
强化血压治疗可降低 2 型糖尿病患者的心血管风险最新发表的科学研究表明，与标准治疗方法相比，降低 2 型糖尿病患者高收缩压的强化治疗方法可降低心脏病发作、中风、心力衰竭和心血管疾病导致的死亡风险今天在美国心脏协会 2024 年科学会议上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Intective-blood-Pressure-treatment-reduces-cardioangio-risk-in-people-with-Type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Intective-blood-Pressure-treatment-reduces-cardioangio-risk-in-people-with-Type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d23decf6-98bc-43da-9b7c-3763bc867104 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 08:40:22 -0500 Intensive blood pressure treatment reduces cardiovascular risk in people with Type 2 diabetes
替西帕肽改善肥胖 HFpEF 患者的心脏健康和功能在国际 SUMMIT 试验中，与参与者相比，患有射血分数保留型心力衰竭 (HFpEF) 和肥胖的成人服用替泽帕肽长达 3 年，心力衰竭事件恶化和心血管死亡的综合风险降低，健康状况和身体功能得到改善根据今天在美国心脏协会 2024 年科学会议上公布的最新科学成果，服用安慰剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Tirzepatide-improves-heart-health-and-function-in-obese-HFpEF-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Tirzepatide-improves-heart-health-and-function-in-obese-HFpEF-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa43e2dd-1887-4f82-a8a9-8ca258d7bfbc Mon, 18 Nov 2024 08:01:17 -0500 Tirzepatide improves heart health and function in obese HFpEF patients
抗凝剂无法减少患有 AFib 的年轻人的认知能力下降根据最新发表的科学研究，给 65 岁以下患有心房颤动 (AFib) 但没有其他中风危险因素的成年人开抗凝血药物并不能降低认知能力下降、中风或短暂性脑缺血发作 (TIA) 的风险今天在美国心脏协会 2024 年科学会议上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Anticoagulants-fail-to-reduce-cognitive-decline-in-younger-adults-with-AFib.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Anticoagulants-fail-to-reduce-cognitive-decline-in-younger-adults-with-AFib.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=384b2e4e-386b-45d4-8de7-c81740f37b65 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 07:51:18 -0500 Anticoagulants fail to reduce cognitive decline in younger adults with AFib
对于室性心动过速，消融可能比药物治疗提供更好的结果据最新研究称，消融是一种治疗心脏病发作引起的异常电短路的手术，通常用于药物治疗无改善的患者，对于经历危险的快速心跳发作的心脏病发作幸存者来说，消融可能是更好的一线治疗方法。今天在美国心脏协会 2024 年科学会议上介绍了突破性科学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Ablation-may-offer-better-outcomes-than-medication-for-心室-tachycardia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Ablation-may-offer-better-outcomes-than-medication-for-心室-tachycardia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04aaa3ac-c019-4819-9957-99483d70319c Mon, 18 Nov 2024 07:44:59 -0500 Ablation may offer better outcomes than medication for ventricular tachycardia
SGLT2 抑制剂卡格列净可改善糖尿病患者的肾氧合2 型糖尿病可导致糖尿病肾病，但一类导致肾脏通过尿液去除葡萄糖的药物已引起人们的关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/SGLT2-inhibitor-canagliflozin-shown-to-improve-kidney-oxygenation-in-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/SGLT2-inhibitor-canagliflozin-shown-to-improve-kidney-oxygenation-in-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=015db0e0-0ea2-48f7-9c03-e71515a10937 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 06:58:59 -0500 SGLT2 inhibitor canagliflozin shown to improve kidney oxygenation in diabetes patients
非甾体抗炎药会增加服用血液稀释剂的患者的出血风险根据《欧洲心脏杂志》发表的研究，服用抗凝药物的人如果服用布洛芬、双氯芬酸或萘普生等非甾体抗炎药 (NSAID) 止痛药，内出血的风险会增加一倍。 1]今天（星期一）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/NSAIDs-raise-bleeding-risk-in-病人-take-blood-thinners.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/NSAIDs-raise-bleeding-risk-in-病人-take-blood-thinners.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2cf4eb6-f5d3-4350-a2a7-bfe842e1917d Mon, 18 Nov 2024 06:47:11 -0500 NSAIDs raise bleeding risk in patients taking blood thinners
激素疗法和青春期阻滞剂改变跨性别者的骨骼大小根据在利物浦举行的第 62 届欧洲儿科内分泌学会年度会议上发表的研究，只有在青春期期间青春期也受到抑制的情况下，性别肯定激素疗法才可能改变骨骼大小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Hormone-therapy-and-puberty-blockers-alter-skeletal-size-in-transgender-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Hormone-therapy-and-puberty-blockers-alter-skeletal-size-in-transgender-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=338d3894-e822-4a91-86b0-0e0a8bb47c10 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 06:31:11 -0500 Hormone therapy and puberty blockers alter skeletal size in transgender individuals
男孩青春期延迟可能会导致未来新的后续医疗保健常规根据在利物浦举行的第 62 届欧洲儿科内分泌学会年度会议上发表的研究，在青春期经历青春期晚期的瑞典年轻男性更有可能在以后的生活中使用医疗服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Delayed-puberty-in-boys-could-lead-to-new-follow-up-healthcare-routines-in-the-future.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Delayed-puberty-in-boys-could-lead-to-new-follow-up-healthcare-routines-in-the-future.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f13ca328-a704-4985-a2cc-f9f332f207d3 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 06:27:17 -0500 Delayed puberty in boys could lead to new follow-up healthcare routines in the future
